Translations.Text: Ini: "anwa ikwen Ip$itin seg igenni akked tmurt? Anwa ay d Bab n tmejjin akked yieoi? Anwa id Issuffu$en amuddir si lmegget, id Issuffu$en lmegget seg umuddir? Anwa i Iseyyin lameo"? A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen n tidep. Deffir tidep, acu i illan, siwa ttelfan? Ihi, acimi texdaam
Akka i iuao wawal n Mass ik, $ef wid ixedmen tucmitin. Ih, nitni ur ppamnen
Ini: "day illa ger icriken nnwen, win id inzan lxelq, sinna, iules as d"? Ini: "Oebbi inezzu lxelq, sinna, Ippales as d. Ihi, amek ara twexxoem

Ini: "day illa, ger icriken nnwen, win i inehhun ar tidep"? Ini: "Oebbi Inehhu ar tidep. Win Inehhun ar tidep, day ur Yif ara, akken Iklal tikli yideS, win ur nennehhu, siwa ma ipwanha? Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepseyyim
Tegwti, segsen, teddun kan d nnwaya. Nnwaya, war ccekk, ur tebbwi acemma si tidep. Ih, Oebbi Issen acu xeddmen
Leqwoan agi ur d innulfa ara, war Oebbi. Maca, d atebbet n wayen it id izwaren, d afeuuel n Tezmamt, ur degs ccekk, s$uo Mass imavalen
Ne$ la qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed tasuoep i t icban, neccdet seg wanda tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii, skaddben ayen ur nekcim di tmusni nnsen, ur ten id iusi usefhem is. Akka ay skaddben, wid i ten id izwaren. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d imednas
Garasen, wid iumnen yis; garasen, wid ur numin yis. Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen ifessaden
